description:
Chase is straight in from Mississippi and he's about as southern as they come. I have to admit that, being a west-coast boy, it took me a few minutes to adjust to Chase's way of thinking. He's definitely one of a kind, but he's also got one hell of a body. Muscular, lean, and ripped from head to toe, with a great dick that he really gets into milking.
He says he's a "pussy connoisseur" and the criteria he gives in his interview for his future wife is priceless (and original to say the least)!
title: Chase
